Character Spies
Characters in your recruitment pool no longer display the spy icon until they are recruited.
Area of Recruitment System
Area of Recruitment is a [[b]]PLAYER ONLY[[/b]] mechanic to prevent AI complications.
Unique units from provincial buildings can only be recruited in their specific region and its capital.
Certain factions have exemptions - for example, Kong Rong can recruit Qi units regardless of location.
Building System Overhaul
Side buildings have been removed and replaced with Provincial Buildings.
Mod Configuration Tool
Starting events have been removed - you now need the MCT mod to enable options.
These changes persist throughout each save game.
Faction Progression Changes
Progression now differs between Major and Minor Factions.
Major Factions can now acquire one additional full bar (32 points total).
Minor Factions remain at 24 points, unchanged from vanilla.
All Han factions now start with 2 armies (except Liu Bei, who starts with 1).
Fortified Resource Counties [[b]](OVERHAUL ONLY)[[/b]]
Resource counties now gain defensive walls at Tiers 4 and 5.
Rank-Based Unit Unlocks [[b]](OVERHAUL ONLY)[[/b]]
Unit unlocks have been moved from Reforms to character rank requirements.
Higher-ranked characters can recruit more advanced unit types.
Trait-Based Court Positions
Basic Court Positions now provide bonuses or penalties based on character traits.
These effects do not carry over when becoming Emperor.
Nomadic Generic Characters
Nomadic factions can now generate faction-specific generic characters.
Currently available only for Xianbei factions.
Title & Armor Rebalance
Titles are now categorized into three tiers: Generic, Unique, and Faction Leader.
Generic titles provide 1 effect, Unique titles provide 2 effects, and select faction leaders receive 3 effects.
All unique armor pieces grant 1 additional effect.
Spousal Bonuses
Spousal Bonuses are unique effects applied from the wife to the husband.
These unique bonuses range from character, army, region, and faction-wide.
Historical Children
Children born after 190 AD, are now spawned in when their birth year is, if their parent is still alive. (Such as, Cao Zhi)
Character Spawns
Characters who join faction during certain years, are now included, find Man Chong and more!
Attribute Changes [[b]](OVERHAUL ONLY)[[/b]]
All Attributes have been changed, now they provide, one minister, one admin, and one character bonus.
Expertise loses it ability to reduce building cost, and now provides it faction-wide.
Building Changes [[b]](OVERHAUL ONLY)[[/b]]
Buildings have been changed to prevent the Commerce + Industry spam.
All income types are viable, and now provide more bonuses
Corruption is now more deadly as it's limited to one building.
Unit Balance [[b]](OVERHAUL ONLY)[[/b]]
All units are been tweaked to be useful in their specific situations.
Yellow Turban Recruitment
As Han, you are now able to recruit Yellow Turban generals.
As Yellow Turban, you are now able to recruit Han generals.
Character Roster Expansion
Current total of unique characters increased to 533 across all factions.
These either start in the map, or spawn in later, to specific factions or to recruitment pools.
Progression Tradeoffs  [[b]](OVERHAUL ONLY)[[/b]]
Progression now comes with tradeoffs, each upgrade threshold passed comes with a negative effect
Trait Changes
Traits no longer appear passively, and are influenced based on what your generals are doing.
